summary: Studio Ghibli is a famous Japanese animation studio known for its amazing movies. Founded in 1985 by directors Hayao Miyazaki and Isao Takahata, it has made many award-winning films. Their most famous character, Totoro, is like a big, friendly spirit. Some of their top movies include *Princess Mononoke*, *Spirited Away*, and *Howl's Moving Castle*. These films have made a lot of money and won big prizes, like the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature. The studio is very successful and loved by fans worldwide.
title: Studio Ghibli
